post.title: AniManGaki 2022 VTuber Highlights
post.content:
A few weeks ago, we reported that AniManGaki 2022, one of the biggest annual anime/cosplay/gaming events in Malaysia, will showcase 80 VTubers. In addition, the event also has VTubers performing on stage as part of the program. Here are some snippets from this year's event.

VTuber Showcase Area

With help from Twitch IRL streamer AGCtv, we are able to take a peek inside the dedicated area where standees of 80 Malaysia VTubers are placed at a distance from each other.

Some TV screens show clips from featured VTubers, while there's one screen that's used by select VTubers to interact with the audience inside. There's also an opportunity to buy merchandise, as well as give presents to the talents. Visitors can also take-home postcards.

Curator PSY8, who is happy to see everyone who went to the showcase enjoying their time, thanked everyone who dropped by:

TQVM everyone for stopping by #AMG2022 VTuber Showcase. There are ups & downs, it was crazy, tiring but most important, Im happy to see everyone enjoying their time & make new friends. Will have a proper thank you post but for now, time to go home.

PSY8 out! ü•∞ #MYVT #MYVTUBER pic.twitter.com/RORy4mWniq

— PSY8 | AMG2022 MyVT Showcase Curator (@psy8_media) August 28, 2022

Stage Performances

MyHoloTV's Liliana Vampaia and Virion Kisei performed on Day 2, singing their covers of DECO*27's The Vampire, ÁÉ≠Áà±105 ‚ÑÉÁöÑ‰Ω†/ÈòøËÇÜSuper Idol (Bahasa Malaysia ver.), Aimer's Zankyou Sanka, Maaya Sakamoto's Platinum, Mandy Moore and Zachary Levi's I See the Light, among others.

Thank you tomatosan for taking the time to record and compile our performanceee!

For those who couldnt attend Animangaki but still would like to watch, do visit the link below!

((Ps, prepare for earrape from the first two songs ;;))#animangaki2022 https://t.co/33rla9LgIY

— ü¶á Liliana Vampaia (Âê∏Ë°ÄÈ¨º „É™„É™„Ç¢„Éä) ü¶á MyHolo TV (@lilianavampaia) August 29, 2022

Closing AniManGaki 2022 is a performance by music producer, novel writer, DJ and VTuber Taka Kazuki who left everyone raving.

He‚Äôs just going for it!!! @Taka_Kazukii pic.twitter.com/5GYar7e9il

— Cornelius LOW („Ç≥„Éº„Éã„É™„Ç¢„Çπ „É≠„Éº) (@Cornelius_LOW) August 28, 2022

Wow... The closing of #AMG2022 was truly something else.
Our homeboy, Kazuki did exceptionally well as the closing act! Congratulations on the successful stage and thank you for representing us Malaysian VTubers!#Vtuber #ENVtuber #MYVtuber #TakaTazuki pic.twitter.com/72D5FdneM8

— Valryia Starfyre üá≤üáæ Shipfu VTuber‚öì (@ValStarfyre) August 28, 2022

AniManGaki 2022 was held at the Mines International Exhibition and Convention Center in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia last weekend, August 27-28.

node.description: Thai VTuber H√òRI 07 is set to leave MyHolo TV Entertainment on Friday, September 30, 2022. In a statement released by the Malaysia-based agency on Twitter, H√òRI 07 will continue to pursue her activities as an independent VTuber.
